title: How can I always show the https in the URL bar?
content:
Hi,

I'm currently on Firefox Developer Edition version 136.0b6, and for some reason the search bar no longer displays the https:// header. Is it possible to turn this back on?
creator: tantomile2

title: Outlook
content: How can I get back to having my Outlook emails back into datal order i.e. latest at the top? I hate that it's alphabetical, it's just not practical as there are often a lot of emails I neither want to delete or put into folders, but I do want to immediately be able to see current, particularly unopened emails, at the top and not having to scroll down through all the others before getting to them - it is ridiculous!
creator: GoldenButtafly
